thread.title: Sidharth Malhotra Gets Inked And The Tattoo Will Shock You!
thread.title_full: Sidharth Malhotra Gets Inked And The Tattoo Will Shock You!

title: Sidharth Malhotra Gets Inked And The Tattoo Will Shock You!
text:
Posted by: Priyanka Prasad Published: Thursday, October 15, 2015, 11:22 [IST] 
You will not believe what Sidharth Malhotra got inked on his arm! Oh, don't be shocked! He didn't do what Deepika Padukone did, in simple words, the tattoo has no relation to Alia Bhatt!As you all know, Sidharth Malhotra got appointed as New Zealand's new tourism ambassador for India and so he is currently busy touring and enjoying the country's beautiful locations.He has tried everything, from sky walking, skydiving to getting inked! Yes, the actor has got a tattoo on his forearm, done by a maori artist!He tweeted during the process of getting inked, "Got Inked by a local Maori Artist ! Any guesses what it is ???" 
Rare Unseen Pics Of Salman Khan And Abhishek Bachchan Bonding While tattoo has become a worldwide obsession, Sidharth did not risk getting a permanent one done! So now, all you fans out there can breathe a sigh of relief!He has got a temporary tattoo of a whale inked on his arm. Sidharth posted a picture and wrote, "It's a Maori whale tale which represents speed,strength & success! But sadly not a permanent one."Check out the actor's tattoo experience in pictures and also his New Zealand vacation photos. Sidharth Malhotra Gets Inked And The Tattoo Will Shock You! 1/11
